comment.author: 21686909@N07
comment._content:
Excellent.

Why do people continue to live here?  Seriously, it has been destroyed several times by storms.

comment.author: 7279101@N06
comment._content: Dated on the right hand edge, 1/6/14.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Sea Bright is a borough of Monmouth County, New Jersey. The worst storms ever to hit Sea Bright (spelled as two words -- nowadays, anyhow) struck on December 26, 1913, and about a week later, on January 3, 4, and 5, 1914. This photo was taken on the 6th of January.

comment.author: 21686909@N07
comment._content: I thought it got hit by that 1938 hurricane, also, the one that really battered the NE coast.
